2. Elden Baker

Elden Baker
===========

![Elden Baker](https://www.annatexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=8805)


About Councilman Elden Baker
----------------------------

Councilman Elden Baker is a 20-year, campaign decorated, Navy Veteran, and a noted railroad historian, in fact many neighbors know him as the Train Guy at the Anna Depot.

He attended Texas A&M University-Commerce (class of 2008) and currently works at Raytheon Intelligence and Space, where he is Manager of Engineering Services for Technical Training. Elden is a teaching pastor and a founding director of the North Texas Grace Bible Fellowship.

Elden and his wife, Connie moved to Anna from Wylie in 2016, they have five grown children, and ten grandchildren.




![Anna, TX Homepage](https://www.annatexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6403)
